lines.text: How do you expect me to read the newspapers? I write them. You can't do everything!
I am sorry, I am really sorry but I haven't shot at anybody yet.
He could be my father... and I don't have the family spirit at all!
Listen, my dear, if women were to try and find out where the money they spend comes from, jewelers would have closed up shop long ago!

lines.character: Un serveur et employé du Triana-Club

lines.text: No, but that is no reason why she shouldn't come!
Yes, it's a widespread opinion. I may end up agreeing with the idea after all.
